    Hi, I’m Jiho

    Product-minded engineer building reliable software and sharing what I learn.

    I help teams go from sketch to shipped product quickly, then write about the process so it’s easy to repeat.

    What I’m focused on

    • Product discovery loops that combine user interviews, analytics, and rapid prototyping.
    • Tooling that lets small teams punch above their weight—developer environments, CI/CD, and observability.
    • Practical AI integrations that augment workflows instead of replacing them.

    Current experiments

    Project Theme Notes
    Launchpad Product marketing Testing interactive release pages powered by a shared CMS.
    Opsboard Support automation Pairing LLM summaries with deterministic alert routing.
    Velocity Kit DX Template repo to bootstrap new web ideas in under an hour.
